movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
movies.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing his path with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
movies.description: The next chapter in the Spider-Verse saga. Sequel to Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018).

movies.title: The Giant Gila Monster
movies.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

movies.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
movies.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

movies.title: Time Chasers
movies.description: An inventor comes up with a time machine, but must prevent its abuse at the hands of an evil C.E.O.

movies.title: The Touch Of Satan
movies.description: A young man meets a farm girl who is actually a witch.

movies.title: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians
movies.description: The Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.

movies.title: Track Of The Moon Beast
movies.description: A young man is transformed into a hideous 'moon beast' due to a meteor fragment lodged in his body.

movies.title: The Skydivers
movies.description: A woman seeks revenge on her former lover, who owns a skydiving business.

movies.title: The Killer Shrews
movies.description: On an isolated island, a small group of people are terrorized by giant voracious shrews in the midst of a hurricane.

movies.title: Project Moon Base
movies.description: A saboteur posing as a scientist strives to destroy the world's first space station.

movies.title: The Giant Spider Invasion
movies.description: Giant spiders from another dimension invade Wisconsin.

movies.title: Catalina Caper
movies.description: A group of swingin' teens take time out from having fun in the sun to try to foil a group of crooks searching for a stolen scroll.

movies.title: Secret Agent Super Dragon
movies.description: A series of murders in Michigan lead an American secret agent to Amsterdam, where he uncovers a plot to imperil the world with a potent new drug.

movies.title: Wild Rebels
movies.description: A stock car driver goes undercover as the wheel man for a motorcycle gang.

movies.title: Danger: Diabolik
movies.description: International man of mystery Diabolik and his lover pull off heist after heist, all while European cops led by Inspector Ginko and envious mobsters led by Ralph Valmont are closing in on them.

movies.title: Village Of The Giants
movies.description: Delinquent teen-agers ingest a substance and grow thirty feet tall, then proceed to take over a small town.
